Description_lang: $?s51723[Fan of Knives]$?s197835[Shuriken Storm] and $?s121411[Crimson Tempest]$?s319175[Black Powder] deal $s1% additional damage while $s2 or more enemies are afflicted with Rupture.

description_blz.en_US: Shuriken Storm and Black Powder deal 30% additional damage while 2 or more enemies are afflicted with Rupture.
description_blz.es_MX: Tormenta de shurikens y Polvo negro infligen un 30% más de daño mientras 2 o más enemigos estén afectados por Ruptura.
description_blz.pt_BR: Tempestade de Shurikens e Pólvora Negra causam 30% a mais de dano enquanto 2 ou mais inimigos estiverem sob efeito de Ruptura.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Shurikensturm' und 'Schwarzpulver' verursachen 30% mehr Schaden, während 2 oder mehr Gegner von 'Blutung' betroffen sind.
description_blz.en_GB: Shuriken Storm and Black Powder deal 30% additional damage while 2 or more enemies are afflicted with Rupture.
description_blz.es_ES: Tormenta de shuriken y Pólvora negra infligen un 30% más de daño mientras Ruptura afecta a 2 o más enemigos.
description_blz.fr_FR: Tempête de shurikens et Poudre noire infligent 30 % de dégâts supplémentaires lorsque 2 personnages adverses ou plus sont affectés par Rupture.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Tempesta di Shuriken e Polvere Nera del 30% quando ci sono 2 o più nemici affetti da Perforazione.
description_blz.ru_RU: Когда "Рваная рана" действует как минимум на 2 противников, "Шквал сюрикэнов" и "Черный порох" наносят на 30% больше урона.
description_blz.ko_KR: 파열에 걸린 적이 2명 이상이면 표창 폭풍 및 검은 화약이 30%의 추가 피해를 입힙니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 當2個以上的敵人受到割裂影響時，手裏劍風暴和黑火藥額外造成30%傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 有至少2名敌人受到割裂影响时，袖剑风暴和黑火药造成的伤害提高30%。
